summary.span: 提供对在 Windows 桌面上可用的共享语言识别服务的访问。

span.span: Provides access to the shared speech recognition service available on the Windows desktop.

span.span: The current location in the speech recognizer's audio input stream through which it has received input.

summary.span: 使用文本而不是同步语音识别的音频来模拟输入到共享语音识别器。

span.span: Emulates input to the shared speech recognizer, using text instead of audio for synchronous speech recognition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这些方法绕过系统音频输入。These methods bypass the system audio input. 在测试或调试应用程序或语法时，这可以是有帮助。This can be helpful when you are testing or debugging an application or grammar. > [!NOTE] > 如果 Windows 语音识别处于**睡眠**状态，则这些方法返回`null`。If Windows Speech Recognition is in the **Sleeping** state, then these methods return `null`. 共享识别器引发， ， ，和事件就像不模拟识别操作。The shared recognizer raises the , , , and events as if the recognition operation is not emulated. 识别器忽略新行和额外的空白区域，并将标点符号视为文字输入。The recognizer ignores new lines and extra white space and treats punctuation as literal input. > [!NOTE] > 响应模拟输入到共享识别器生成的对象的值为`null`有关其属性。The object generated by the shared recognizer in response to emulated input has a value of `null` for its property. 若要模拟异步标识，使用方法。To emulate asynchronous recognition, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult EmulateRecognize(string inputText) cil managed
Public Function EmulateRecognize (inputText As String) As RecognitionResult

span.span: The input for the recognition operation.

summary.span: 使用文本而不是异步语音识别的音频来模拟输入短语到共享语音识别器。

span.span: Emulates input of a phrase to the shared speech recognizer, using text instead of audio for synchronous speech recognition.

returns.span: 识别操作的识别结果；或者，如果操作不成功或是窗口语音识别处于“睡眠”状态，则为 。

span.span: The recognition result for the recognition operation, or , if the operation is not successful or Windows Speech Recognition is in the **Sleeping** state.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult EmulateRecognize(class System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit[] wordUnits, valuetype System.Globalization.CompareOptions compareOptions) cil managed

param.name: wordUnits
param.span: 词单元数组，包含识别操作输入。

span.span: An array of word units that contains the input for the recognition operation.

param.name: compareOptions
param.span: 描述用于模拟识别操作的比较说明类型的枚举值的按位组合。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that describe the type of comparison to use for the emulated recognition operation.

summary.span: 使用文本代替同步语音识别的音频来模拟特定字输入到共享语音识别器，并指定识别器如何处理单词和加载的语音识别语法间的 Unicode 比较。

span.span: Emulates input of specific words to the shared speech recognizer, using text instead of audio for synchronous speech recognition, and specifies how the recognizer handles Unicode comparison between the words and the loaded speech recognition grammars.

returns.span: 识别操作的识别结果；或者，如果操作不成功或是窗口语音识别处于“睡眠”状态，则为 。

span.span: The recognition result for the recognition operation, or , if the operation is not successful or Windows Speech Recognition is in the **Sleeping** state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建对象使用中提供的信息`wordUnits`参数。This method creates a object using the information provided in the `wordUnits` parameter. 识别器使用`compareOptions`如果它适用于输入短语语法规则。The recognizer uses the `compareOptions` when it applies grammar rules to the input phrase. 随 Vista 和 Windows 7 的识别器忽略大小写，如果或值是否存在。The recognizers that ship with Vista and Windows 7 ignore case if the or value is present. 识别器始终忽略字符宽度，永远不会忽略假名类型。The recognizers always ignore the character width and never ignore the Kana type. 识别器还忽略新行和额外的空白区域，并将标点符号视为文字输入。The recognizers also ignore new lines and extra white space and treats punctuation as literal input. 有关字符宽度和假名类型的详细信息，请参阅枚举。For more information about character width and Kana type, see the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult EmulateRecognize(string inputText, valuetype System.Globalization.CompareOptions compareOptions) cil managed

span.span: The input phrase for the recognition operation.

param.name: compareOptions
param.span: 描述用于模拟识别操作的比较说明类型的枚举值的按位组合。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that describe the type of comparison to use for the emulated recognition operation.

summary.span: 使用文本代替异步语音识别的音频来模拟短语输入到共享语音识别器，并指定识别器如何处理短语和加载的语音识别语法间的 Unicode 比较。

span.span: Emulates input of a phrase to the shared speech recognizer, using text instead of audio for synchronous speech recognition, and specifies how the recognizer handles Unicode comparison between the phrase and the loaded speech recognition grammars.

returns.span: 识别操作的识别结果；或者，如果操作不成功或是窗口语音识别处于“睡眠”状态，则为 。

span.span: The recognition result for the recognition operation, or , if the operation is not successful or Windows Speech Recognition is in the **Sleeping** state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 识别器使用`compareOptions`如果它适用于输入短语语法规则。The recognizer uses the `compareOptions` when it applies grammar rules to the input phrase. 随 Vista 和 Windows 7 的识别器忽略大小写，如果或值是否存在。The recognizers that ship with Vista and Windows 7 ignore case if the or value is present. 识别器始终忽略字符宽度，永远不会忽略假名类型。The recognizers always ignore the character width and never ignore the Kana type. 识别器还忽略新行和额外的空白区域，并将标点符号视为文字输入。The recognizers also ignore new lines and extra white space and treats punctuation as literal input. 有关字符宽度和假名类型的详细信息，请参阅枚举。For more information about character width and Kana type, see the enumeration.

summary.span: 使用文本而不是异步语音识别的音频来模拟输入到共享语音识别器。

span.span: Emulates input to the shared speech recognizer, using text instead of audio for asynchronous speech recognition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这些方法绕过系统音频输入。These methods bypass the system audio input. 在测试或调试应用程序或语法时，这可以是有帮助。This can be helpful when you are testing or debugging an application or grammar. 共享识别器引发， ， ，和事件就像不模拟识别操作。The shared recognizer raises the , , , and events as if the recognition operation is not emulated. 当识别器完成异步标识操作时，将引发事件。When the recognizer completes the asynchronous recognition operation, it raises the event. 识别器忽略新行和额外的空白区域，并将标点符号视为文字输入。The recognizer ignores new lines and extra white space and treats punctuation as literal input. > [!NOTE] > 如果 Windows 语音识别处于**睡眠**状态，则共享识别器不会处理输入并不会引发和相关的事件，但仍将引发事件。If Windows Speech Recognition is in the **Sleeping** state, then the shared recognizer does not process input and does not raise the and related events, but still raises the event. > [!NOTE] > 响应模拟输入到共享识别器生成的对象的值为`null`有关其属性。The object generated by the shared recognizer in response to emulated input has a value of `null` for its property. 若要模拟同步识别，请使用方法。To emulate synchronous recognition, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 识别器使用`compareOptions`如果它适用于输入短语语法规则。The recognizer uses the `compareOptions` when it applies grammar rules to the input phrase. 随 Vista 和 Windows 7 的识别器忽略大小写，如果或值是否存在。The recognizers that ship with Vista and Windows 7 ignore case if the or value is present. 识别器始终忽略字符宽度，永远不会忽略假名类型。The recognizers always ignore the character width and never ignore the Kana type. 识别器还忽略新行和额外的空白区域，并将标点符号视为文字输入。The recognizers also ignore new lines and extra white space and treats punctuation as literal input. 有关字符宽度和假名类型的详细信息，请参阅枚举。For more information about character width and Kana type, see the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Event EmulateRecognizeCompleted As EventHandler(Of EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs)

summary.span: 当共享的识别器终结模拟输入的异步识别操作时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the shared recognizer finalizes an asynchronous recognition operation for emulated input.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Enabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Enabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此 对象是否准备好处理语音。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this object is ready to process speech.

value.span: 如果此 对象执行语音识别；否则。

span.span: if this object is performing speech recognition; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更改此属性不会影响的其他实例类。Changes to this property do not affect other instances of the class. 默认情况下的值属性是`true`的实例的新实例化。By default, the value of the property is `true` for a newly instantiated instance of . 禁用识别器后，将识别的语音识别语法都可用于识别操作。While the recognizer is disabled, none of the recognizer's speech recognition grammars are available for recognition operations. 设置识别器的属性对识别器的无效属性。Setting the recognizer's property has no effect on the recognizer's property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Grammars As ReadOnlyCollection(Of Grammar)

summary.span: 获取在此 实例中加载的 对象的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the objects that are loaded in this instance.

value.span: 应用程序加载到共享识别器的当前实例的 对象的集合。

span.span: A collection of the objects that the application loaded into the current instance of the shared recognizer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void LoadGrammar(class System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar grammar) cil managed

span.span: The speech recognition grammar to load.

summary.span: 加载语音识别语法。

span.span: Loads a speech recognition grammar.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void LoadGrammarAsync(class System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar grammar) cil managed

span.span: The speech recognition grammar to load.

summary.span: 异步加载语音识别语法。

span.span: Asynchronously loads a speech recognition grammar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当识别器完成这一异步操作时，将引发事件。When the recognizer completes this asynchronous operation, it raises a event. 如果语音识别语法已加载，正在以异步方式加载，或者未能加载到任何识别器，识别器引发异常。The recognizer throws an exception if the speech recognition grammar is already loaded, is being asynchronously loaded, or has failed to load into any recognizer. 如果识别器正在运行，应用程序必须使用暂停之前加载、 卸载、 启用，或禁用某个语法语音识别引擎。If the recognizer is running, applications must use to pause the speech recognition engine before loading, unloading, enabling, or disabling a grammar. 若要以同步方式加载语音识别语法，请使用方法。To load a speech recognition grammar synchronously, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Event LoadGrammarCompleted As EventHandler(Of LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs)

summary.span: 当识别器完成语音识别语法的异步加载时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the recognizer finishes the asynchronous loading of a speech recognition grammar.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxAlternates { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxAlternates : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置共享识别器为每个识别操作返回的备用识别结果的最大数量。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of alternate recognition results that the shared recognizer returns for each recognition operation.

value.span: 语音识别器返回每个标识操作的替换结果的最大数目。

span.span: The maximum number of alternate results that the speech recognizer returns for each recognition operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的属性类中包含的集合对象表示输入的其他候选的解释。The property of the class contains the collection of objects that represent other candidate interpretations of the input. 默认值为为 10。The default value for is 10.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool PauseRecognizerOnRecognition { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.PauseRecognizerOnRecognition : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，此值指示共享识别器是否在应用程序处理 事件时暂停识别操作。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the shared recognizer pauses recognition operations while an application is handling a event.

value.span: 如果共享识别器等待处理输入，当所有应用程序处理 事件时；否则。

span.span: if the shared recognizer waits to process input while any application is handling the event; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置为`true`，如果在应用程序需要更改语音识别服务的状态或更改已加载或已启用语音识别语法在语音识别服务之前的事件处理程序更多输入的进程。Set this property to `true`, if within the event handler your application needs to change the state of the speech recognition service or change the loaded or enabled speech recognition grammars before the speech recognition service processes more input. > [!NOTE] > 设置属性设置为`true`会导致每个中每个应用程序以阻止 Windows 语音识别服务的事件处理程序。Setting the property to `true` causes each event handler in every application to block the Windows speech recognition service. 若要与应用程序状态同步对共享识别器的更改，请使用方法。To synchronize the changes to the shared recognizer with your application state, use the method. 当是`true`，在执行期间处理程序的语音识别服务暂停并到达时缓冲新音频输入。When is `true`, during the execution of the handler the speech recognition service pauses and buffers new audio input as it arrives. 一次事件处理程序将退出，语音识别服务继续识别并开始处理其输入缓冲区中的信息。Once the event handler exits, the speech recognition service resumes recognition and starts processing information from its input buffer. 若要启用或禁用语音识别服务，请使用属性。To enable or disable the speech recognition service, use the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RecognizerAudioPosition As TimeSpan
public: property TimeSpan RecognizerAudioPosition { TimeSpan get(); };

summary.span: 获取在处理的音频输入中的识别器当前位置。

span.span: Gets the current location of the recognizer in the audio input that it is processing.

value.span: 识别器的位置在处理音频的输入。

span.span: The position of the recognizer in the audio input that it is processing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `RecognizerAudioPosition`属性引用在处理其音频输入的识别器的位置。The `RecognizerAudioPosition` property references the recognizer's position in processing its audio input. 与此相反，属性引用其生成的音频流中的输入的设备的位置。By contrast, the property references the input device's position in its generated audio stream. 这些位置可以是不同的。These positions can be different. 例如，如果识别器已收到输入并为具有不还生成识别结果然后的值属性小于的值属性。For example, if the recognizer has received input for which it has not yet generated a recognition result then the value of the property is less than the value of the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RecognizerInfo As RecognizerInfo

summary.span: 获取共享语音识别器的相关信息。

span.span: Gets information about the shared speech recognizer.

value.span: 该共享语音识别器的相关信息。

span.span: Information about the shared speech recognizer.

span.span: Occurs when the recognizer pauses to synchronize recognition and other operations.

summary.span: 请求共享识别器暂停和更新其状态。

span.span: Requests that the shared recognizer pause and update its state.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RequestRecognizerUpdate() cil managed

summary.span: 请求共享识别器暂停和更新其状态。

span.span: Requests that the shared recognizer pause and update its state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当识别器生成事件，的属性是`null`。When the recognizer generates the event, the property of the is `null`. 若要提供的用户令牌，请使用或方法。To provide a user token, use the or method. 若要指定的音频位置偏移量，请使用方法。To specify an audio position offset, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RequestRecognizerUpdate(object userToken) cil managed

param.name: userToken
param.span: 用户定义信息包含该操作的信息。

span.span: User-defined information that contains information for the operation.

summary.span: 请求共享识别器暂停和更新其状态并为关联的事件提供用户标记。

span.span: Requests that the shared recognizer pause and update its state and provides a user token for the associated event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当识别器生成事件，的属性包含值的`userToken`参数。When the recognizer generates the event, the property of the contains the value of the `userToken` parameter. 若要指定的音频位置偏移量，请使用方法。To specify an audio position offset, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public void RequestRecognizerUpdate (object userToken, TimeSpan audioPositionAheadToRaiseUpdate);
.method public hidebysig instance void RequestRecognizerUpdate(object userToken, valuetype System.TimeSpan audioPositionAheadToRaiseUpdate) cil managed
Public Sub RequestRecognizerUpdate (userToken As Object, audioPositionAheadToRaiseUpdate As TimeSpan)
public: void RequestRecognizerUpdate(System::Object ^ userToken, TimeSpan audioPositionAheadToRaiseUpdate);

param.name: userToken
param.span: 用户定义信息包含该操作的信息。

span.span: User-defined information that contains information for the operation.

param.name: audioPositionAheadToRaiseUpdate
param.span: 从当前到延迟请求的 偏移量。

span.span: The offset from the current to delay the request.

summary.span: 请求共享识别器暂停和更新其状态并为关联的事件提供偏移量和用户标记。

span.span: Requests that the shared recognizer pause and update its state and provides an offset and a user token for the associated event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 识别器不会启动之前识别器的识别器更新请求等于当前加上的值`audioPositionAheadToRaiseUpdate`参数。The recognizer does not initiate the recognizer update request until the recognizer's equals the current plus the value of the `audioPositionAheadToRaiseUpdate` parameter. 当识别器生成事件，的属性包含值的`userToken`参数。When the recognizer generates the event, the property of the contains the value of the `userToken` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Event SpeechDetected As EventHandler(Of SpeechDetectedEventArgs)

summary.span: 当识别器删除它可以标识为语音的输入时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the recognizer detects input that it can identify as speech.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SpeechHypothesized As EventHandler(Of SpeechHypothesizedEventArgs)

summary.span: 当识别器已识别可以为语法中多个完整的短语的组件的一个字或多个字时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the recognizer has recognized a word or words that may be a component of multiple complete phrases in a grammar.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Event SpeechRecognitionRejected As EventHandler(Of SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs)

summary.span: 当识别器接收不与它已加载的任何语音识别语法匹配的输入时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the recognizer receives input that does not match any of the speech recognition grammars it has loaded.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Event SpeechRecognized As EventHandler(Of SpeechRecognizedEventArgs)

summary.span: 当识别器接收与其语音识别语法匹配的输入时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the recognizer receives input that matches one of its speech recognition grammars.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property State As RecognizerState

summary.span: 获取 对象的状态。

span.span: Gets the state of a object.
The state of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此只读属性指示共享识别器驻留在 Windows 中是否处于`Stopped`或`Listening`状态。This read-only property indicates whether the shared recognizer resident in Windows is in the `Stopped` or the `Listening` state. 有关详细信息，请参见 枚举。For more information, see the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Event StateChanged As EventHandler(Of StateChangedEventArgs)

summary.span: 当 Windows“桌面语音技术”识别引擎的运行状态更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the running state of the Windows Desktop Speech Technology recognition engine changes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void UnloadAllGrammars() cil managed

summary.span: 从共享识别器卸载所有语音识别语法。

span.span: Unloads all speech recognition grammars from the shared recognizer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果识别器当前正在以异步方式加载的语法，此方法等待，直到之前卸载识别器的语法的所有加载的语法。If the recognizer is currently loading a grammar asynchronously, this method waits until the grammar is loaded, before it unloads all of the recognizer's grammars. 若要卸载的特定语法，请使用方法。To unload a specific grammar, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void UnloadGrammar(class System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar grammar) cil managed

span.span: The grammar to unload.

summary.span: 从共享识别器卸载指定语音识别语法。

span.span: Unloads a specified speech recognition grammar from the shared recognizer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果识别器正在运行，应用程序必须使用暂停之前加载、 卸载、 启用，或禁用某个语法语音识别引擎。If the recognizer is running, applications must use to pause the speech recognition engine before loading, unloading, enabling, or disabling a grammar. 若要卸载的所有语法，请使用方法。To unload all grammars, use the method.
